summary: Extended archery skill perks for more archery-focused character.
descriptionHtml:
DOWNLOAD THIS: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7891

This is my first mod that I made with SkyEdit, so there may be a lot of bugs but I\'ve tested it many times and I didn\'t encounter with a bug or ctd.

So what it does?

This is an extended version of Archery perks for suit to 200 skill level cap (As you progress above 100 archery skill points, your bow attack will increase). So DON\'T USE THIS MOD ALONE, to prevent ctd\'s or bugs you must use this with:

1- My own settings for Elys Uncapper, can be found in Downloads section. (200 skill cap)

2- For not being overpowered with archer characters, you must use Wars in Skyrim IV Dark Age and Deadly Dragons mods, with their Hardcore difficulty settings.

[b]Wars in Skyrim:[/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6176

[b]Deadly Dragons:[/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3829

3- Optional: If you want a slower skill gaining progression, use Skyrim Re-Level, I reccommend maximum %50 slower skill gaining setting, you can use 30% or 20% also.

[b]Skyrim Re-Level:[/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4630


[b]INSTALLATION:[/b]
Extract ArcheryExtended200.esp to your \"The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim/Data\" folder, than set active it from DATA FILES of your Skyrim Launcher menu.
Extract SKSE_Elys_Uncapper.dll and SKSE_Elys_Uncapper.ini to your \"The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins\" folder. (REQUIRES SKSE, you can download latest version from here: http://skse.silverlock.org/)


[b][color=red]List of New Skill Ranks:[/color][/b]


Overdraw 1(Requires 0): Bows do 20% more damage.
Overdraw 2(Requires 20): Bows do 40% more damage.
Overdraw 3(Requires 40): Bows do 60% more damage.
Overdraw 4(Requires 60): Bows do 80% more damage.
Overdraw 5(Requires 80): Bows do 100% more damage.

[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Overdraw 6(Requires 100): Bows do 120% more damage.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Overdraw 7(Requires 120): Bows do 140% more damage.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Overdraw 8(Requires 140): Bows do 160% more damage.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Overdraw 9(Requires 160): Bows do 180% more damage.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Overdraw 10(Requires 180): Bows do 200% more damage.

Eagle Eye 1(Requires 30): Pressing Block while aiming will zoom in your view.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Eagle Eye 2(Requires 60): Pressing Block while aiming will zoom in your view by x2.

Steady Hands 1(requires 40): Zooming in with a bow slows time by 25%
Steady Hands 2(requires 60): Zooming in with a bow slows time by 50%
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Steady Hands 3(requires 100): Zooming in with a bow slows time by 75%

Critical Shot 1(requires 30): 10% chance of a critical hit that does extra damage.
Critical Shot 2(requires 60): 15% chance of a critical hit that does 25% more critical damage.
Critical Shot 3(requires 90): 20% chance of a critical hit that does 50% more critical damage.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Critical Shot 4(requires 120): 25% chance of a critical hit that does 75% more critical damage.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Critical Shot 5(requires 150): 30% chance of a critical hit that does 100% more critical damage.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Critical Shot 6(requires 180): 35% chance of a critical hit that does 125% more critical damage.

Hunter\'s Disciplines 1(requires 50): Recover twice as many arrows from dead bodies.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Hunter\'s Disciplines 2(requires 100): Recover three times as many arrows from dead bodies.

Power Shot 1(requires 50): Arrows stagger all but the largest opponents 50% of the time.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Power Shot 2(requires 100): Arrows stagger all but the largest opponents 75% of the time.

Ranger 1([b][color=red]requires 120[/color][/b]): Able to move faster with a drawn bow.

Quick Shot 1(requires 70): Can draw a bow 30% faster.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Quick Shot 2(requires 140): Can draw a bow 60% faster.

Bull\'s Eye 1(requires 100): 15% chance of paralyzing the target for 10 seconds.
[b][color=red]NEW:[/color][/b] Bull\'s Eye 2(requires 200): 30% chance of paralyzing the target for 20 seconds.
author: TuCoT
